Description:
Noroy is 39 years old.  She is a hardworking woman from the rural area.  She is married and has 2 children.  One of them is an adult.  Her husband Abdukahor is a master at repairing houses.  

Noroy has been busy with animal husbandry.  She feeds cows.  Noroy has additional income from growing agricultural products such as potatoes and wheat.  She is the main source of income for her family.  Noroy’s son does have a job in Tajikistan.  He is going to go to Russia to find a job.  She is asking for a loan of 3,000 Somoni to buy an airline ticket for her son.  She awaits your support.
Use: To buy an airline ticket for her son to go to Russia to look for a job.
Keywords:
The most relevant keywords are: 

1.  "lending", "entrepreneur", rural area", "loans, "job search," "Russia", "family," "women workforce" and "parent, "micro-loans", "job seeking," "micro-entrepreneurs" and "helping families" and "farm to fond".
